title: Lights, Camera, Meghan and Prince Harry’s Legal Actions
description:
Is being royal and famous overhyped? Maybe. Join us as we discuss Meghan Markle’s struggle to keep her private life private after she sues leading UK tabloid for publishing an intimate letter meant for her Dad’s eyes only.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
